title: Specialized Jett kid’s bike gets Retul treatment & app based fit tool for the perfect fit
content:
Making a great kid’s bike can be pretty challenging. Frequent growth spurts make finding the perfect fit a moving target. At the same time, the bikes need to be light enough that they’re actually fun to ride for small cyclists.
